TopicTitle: Quick question on EVE cloud textures

Articles.Content: I've been trying to figure out how to make eve cloud layer textures into cube maps for eve, is it required for eve to function? Or can I use the normal rectangular file, if so, are there any special things I have to do to the file?
Here's a tutorial on making cub maps:

On 6/6/2017 at 1:58 AM, FokkerAce said:

I've been trying to figure out how to make eve cloud layer textures into cube maps for eve, is it required for eve to function? Or can I use the normal rectangular file, if so, are there any special things I have to do to the file?

You can just use rectangular files and reference the address in the config. 

Example: Stockvisualenhancements/clouds/atmosphere/textures/kerbin1

Okay, thats a good thing..... What do you call a rectangular file in the code, just rectangular file? (i.e. in type of file, it says cube map in boulderco cloud config files, do you have to do that for rectangular files?)

 

Edited June 8, 2017 by FokkerAce
